mapper.select: select id,cone_bucket_type,cone_bucket_num,create_time from cone_bucket_message where cone_bucket_num = #{coneBucketNum} limit 1

SELECT cbm.id, cbm.cone_bucket_type as coneBucketType, cpt.type_name as coneBucketTypeStr, cbm.cone_bucket_num as coneBucketNum FROM `cone_bucket_message` AS cbm LEFT JOIN project_cone_bucket AS pcb ON cbm.id = pcb.cone_bucket_id LEFT JOIN cone_bucket_type AS cpt ON cbm.cone_bucket_type = cpt.id WHERE pcb.pro_id = #{proId}
